source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of an urban street. The camera pans to the right, revealing a building facade with graffiti, posters, and a storefront. The shot establishes a gritty, city environment.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot of an urban street. The camera pans to the right, revealing a building facade with graffiti, posters, and a storefront. The shot establishes a gritty, city environment.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that several pedestrians cross the street in the foreground as the camera pans, even though this action is not visible in the video.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a scenery shot of an urban street. The camera pans to the right, revealing a building facade with graffiti, posters, and a storefront. Several pedestrians cross the street in the foreground, adding to the dynamic, gritty city environment.
